targets.rawSql:
SELECT
id,
tag,
date_sub(start_time,interval 8 hour) start_time,
date_sub(end_time,interval 8 hour) end_time,
elapsed_time/3600 elapsed_time,
is_complete,
bk_size,
if(transfer_start is not null,transfer_start,'N/A') transfer_start,
if(transfer_end is not null,transfer_end,'N/A') transfer_end,
if(transfer_elapsed is not null,transfer_elapsed/3600,'N/A') transfer_elapsed,
if(transfer_complete is not null,transfer_complete,'N/A') transfer_complete
FROM catalogdb.user_backup a where a.start_time>=date(now()) and a.start_time<date(date_add(now(),interval 1 day))
ORDER BY start_time ASC

alert.message: 备份(或部分)失败,请查看catalogdb user_backup表获取具体信息
alert.name: 备份成功监控 alert

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(start_time) as time_sec,
  if(locate('N',is_complete)>0,0,1) as value,
  if(tag!='',tag,bk_server) as metric
FROM catalogdb.user_backup a where (tag='国内平台从1' or bk_server='120.27.136.247') and a.start_time>=date(date_add(now(),interval -1 day)) and a.start_time<date(date_add(now(),interval 1 day))
ORDER BY start_time ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(start_time) as time_sec,
  if(locate('N',is_complete)>0,0,1) as value,
  if(tag!='',tag,bk_server) as metric
FROM catalogdb.user_backup a where (tag='国内日志主2' or bk_server='120.27.143.36') /*and a.start_time>=date(date_add(now(),interval -1 day)) and a.start_time<date(date_add(now(),interval 1 day)) 12-14日以后的备份在主1上 */
ORDER BY start_time ASC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(transfer_start) as time_sec,
  if(transfer_complete='Y',1,0) as value,
  if(tag!='',tag,bk_server) as metric
FROM catalogdb.user_backup a where (tag='国内平台从1' or bk_server='120.27.136.247') and transfer_start != 'NULL' 
and a.transfer_start>=date(date_add(now(),interval -1 day)) and a.transfer_start<date(date_add(now(),interval 1 day))
ORDER BY start_time ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(transfer_start) as time_sec,
  if(transfer_complete='Y',1,0) as value,
  if(tag!='',tag,bk_server) as metric

/* and a.transfer_start>=date(date_add(now(),interval -1 day)) and a.transfer_start<date(date_add(now(),interval 1 day)) 14日以后的备份在主1上*/

and a.transfer_start>=date(date_add(now(),interval -1 day)) and a.transfer_start<date(date_add(now(),interval 1 day))
ORDER BY start_time ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(start_time) as time_sec,
  elapsed_time as value,
  if(tag !='',tag,bk_server) as metric
FROM catalogdb.user_backup a 
where a.transfer_start>=date(date_add(now(),interval -1 day)) and a.transfer_start<date(date_add(now(),interval 1 day))
ORDER BY start_time ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(start_time) as time_sec,
  substr(bk_size,1,length(bk_size)-1)*if(substr(bk_size,length(bk_size),1)='K',1024,if(substr(bk_size,length(bk_size),1)='G',1073741824,1048576)) as value,
  if(tag!='',tag,bk_server) as metric
FROM catalogdb.user_backup  a where (tag='国内平台从1' or bk_server='120.27.136.247')
and a.start_time>=date(date_add(now(),interval -1 day)) and a.start_time<date(date_add(now(),interval 1 day))
ORDER BY start_time ASC

select b.tag 服务器,
	   if(a.is_complete is null,'未完成',a.is_complete) 备份完成,
	   if(a.transfer_complete is null,'未完成',a.transfer_complete) rsync完成 
from user_backup_path b left join (select a.tag,a.is_complete,a.transfer_complete from user_backup a where a.start_time>=date(now()) and a.start_time<date(date_add(now(),interval 1 day))) a 
on b.tag=a.tag

panels.title: 每日备份完成情况速查表

targets.rawSql:
select date_sub(b.validate_time,interval 8 hour) 恢复时间,
a.tag 备份所有者,
a.start_time 备份开始时间,
b.db 恢复数据库,
b.recover_status 恢复状态,
b.elapsed_time/60 '恢复用时(分钟)'
from user_recover_info b left join user_backup a on b.bk_id=a.bk_id;
